title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.6 - Exterior and interior elevators-waterless holders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.6 - Exterior and interior elevators-waterless holders

State Regulations
A test and inspection of the exterior and interior elevator
safety devices, cables, hoists, rope baskets, drums, sheaves, etc., shall be
made at least once a year by trained elevator inspectors not connected with the
company or any of its affiliates. An inspection of the exterior elevator shall
be made at least once a week by the company. Inspection of interior elevator
shall be made as outlined herein under "Interior Inspectors--Waterless

Holders."
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
256.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
